trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Livonia
There were no other sightings in Livonia on or around August 15th 2008
Summary: large orange object flew over our house
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out in our back yard with my daughter. on a perfect summer night. she began calling me and telling me that there was something in the sky. when i looked up to the sky i saw a large bright solid round orange object comming tord us. it was about as high up as a plane only bigger and round and it was a solid orange colar with what looked like red at the top. my daughter kept asking me what it was. i wish i had a answer for her but i didnt. it didnt make any sound at all as it flew over our house and over my yard. it seemed to be moving from west heading east. and in a straight line and a fast rate of speed. i stood up on my daughters play toys and watched it fly away. were really not sure what it was.. were wonderning if anyone else has reported this object.
